content: maestrale is a triangular shawl with an airy lace pattern and a little hint of texture it is perfect for summer to wear on a plain dress or even to be used as a pareo on the beach this pattern was designed with scheepjes whirl but you are free to use your favorite yarn of course i would recommend using fingering weight yarn using a different weight could or will require adjustments that i cannot provide in this pattern feel free to mix and match your favorite colors and your favorite yarn use your own creativity please take your time to check your gauge you can crochet the first 10 row and measure one whole repeat it should be a square 8 x 8 cm about 3 x 3 inch this way you can use all your scheepjes whirl cake you can choose to ignore the gauge requirements if you are using a different yarn of course note the correct stitch count at the end of row 34 is 119 double_crochet i hope you enjoy as i did news a video tutorial is now available on youtube https //youtu be/1hgqb_0j1tu ***for questions tips and inspiration join my ravelry group lthe crafting tales 1 follow crafting tales instagram account @nimhriel or the facebook page nimhriel*** 1 https //www ravelry com/groups/the-crafting-tales
